taskDescription: Migrate CodeCollabProj from JavaScript to TypeScript with gradual strictness. Phase 0 infrastructure is complete (tsconfig, eslint, prettier, husky, CI workflow). Now need to create types foundation and migrate all source files incrementally.

features.description: Phase 1: Create server types foundation (models.ts, express.d.ts, api.ts, environment.d.ts)
Phase 1: Create client types foundation (models.ts, auth.ts, forms.ts, environment.d.ts)
Phase 2: Migrate server utils and config (constants, logger, passwordValidator, envValidator, scheduledTasks, gridfs)
Phase 3: Migrate server models (Session, User, Project, Comment, Message)
Phase 4: Migrate server services and middleware (sessionService, emailService, auth, rbac, validators, errorHandler, securityMonitoring)
Phase 5: Migrate server controllers and routes (authController, userController, projectController, commentController, adminController, all routes, index.js)
Phase 6: Migrate client utils and config (constants, queryClient, validation, sanitize, logger, performance, tokenEncryption, api)
Phase 7: Migrate client services (authService, projectsService, usersService, commentsService, adminService, index)
Phase 8: Migrate client hooks - auth domain (useAuth, useLogin, useRegister, useLogout, useChangePassword, usePasswordReset, useSessions)
Phase 8: Migrate client hooks - projects domain (useProjects, useProject, useProjectMutations, useCollaborationMutations)
Phase 8: Migrate client hooks - comments and users domain (useComments, useCommentMutations, useUsers, useProfileMutations, useMessaging)
Phase 8: Migrate client hooks - admin domain (useAdminDashboard, useAdminUsers)
Phase 9: Migrate client components - common and layout
Phase 9: Migrate client components - auth and routing
Phase 9: Migrate client components - projects and comments
Phase 9: Migrate client components - messaging, dashboard, admin, pages
Phase 9: Migrate App.jsx and index.js to TypeScript
Phase 10: Migrate server tests to TypeScript
Phase 10: Migrate client tests to TypeScript
Phase 10: Migrate Playwright E2E tests to TypeScript
